invalid_login_credentials: Invalid login credentials! Please enter correct email address and password.
account_disable: Your account has been disabled. Please contact administrator person.
forgot_password_description: Enter the email address you used to register on laytrip. We’ll send you a link to reset your password.
not_registerd_email: Email is not registered with us. Please check the email.
reset_password_description: OTP was sent successfully. Please check your email to reset your password.
password_string_validation: Your password must contain 1 Alpha, 1 numeric , 1 special & 8 character long.
covid_description: Please be advised on our cancellation and refund policies
max_passengers_without_infant_validation: Maximum number of passengers all together should not exceed 9 except infants.
infant_less_than_adult_validation: Infant count should be less than Adults.
installment_info_page_description_1: We believe travelling should be accessible to all!
installment_info_page_description_2: laytrip makes it possible to split the total amount of your travel into multiple deposits, while locking-in your booking price, giving you planning and payment options.
installment_info_page_description_3: The payments are flexible and are not charged with an interest
installment_info_page_small_title_descri: Start Your Trip Booking and Make Full Payment OR
mobile_page_description_2: Access the app at the Android Google Play and on Apple App Store.
mobile_page_get_nearly_update: Be the first to get nearly updates
laytrip_info_page_title_1_description: Making travel affordable for all. Book now, pay with installments.
home_page_footer: Affordable flight, hotel and home rentals bookings with laytrip.© laytrip 2020
